attributes.title: Donald Duck the Cheeto puff 👎🏽
attributes.review: This app has so many bugs ! Right when I opened it I see the biggest bug ever! It was wearing a suit and had a terrible spray tan. Anyways, my hamster became deaf soon after I started using this app and now I have to learn sign language for him 👎🏽 would not recommend

attributes.title: DISGUSTED 👁👄👁
attributes.review: The app itself is just completely useless. I do not need to see a bright orange man on my screen every time I open my phone. It’s just to much pressure and it’s not good for my health. So I would love it if you would remove this HORRIBLE APP. I repeat not good for anybody 🥰🥰✨just my opinion though xoxo❤️

attributes.title: Kim Namjoon 2020!!!💜
attributes.review: I opened up the app just to see a deformed Cheeto puff. According to the government he is our president which I believe needs to get checked. This deformed Cheeto is also racist and a rapist that should belong in jail. He also has hay as a wig. So instead of wasting tour time downloading this app download TIKTOK and stream “Stay Gold” by Bts 🥰💜!!!!

attributes.title: Very disappointing
attributes.review: I thought this was an app to track Donald to avoid his tiny grabby hands. Instead I see a Cheeto grinning like cheaper and older , rundown version of 69. 🤮 also, we would like to point out that the picture of the Vienna weenie was very uncalled for! No one wants to see that!

attributes.title: Just HORRIBLE to have and very glitchy
attributes.review: I initially downloaded the app to be able to keep up with “our president” i was so excited but was brought to disappointment of how glitchy and badly organized the app is. The hot cheeto man is gonna go down along w this app i hope.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and i noticed a huge cheeto on my screen and was mortified as what i was seeing🤢 this app will posses anything, i was sitting next to my cat and next thing you know he is barking like a dog and started growing!! i was so very terrified😰 it didn’t stop there i went into my kitchen to make a something to eat and my fridge started floating off of the ground and threatened to eat me😤😤 i recommend not downloading this app or something like this will happen to you!! ⓉⓇⓊⓂ︎Ⓟ💅🏽🙈💕😍😳🥰👀💯🤪 but on a 𝐺𝑅𝐴𝑉𝐸𝑆𝑇𝑂𝑁𝐸😘😘

attributes.title: Cheeto Dust
attributes.review: This app has done nothing but give me a hard time. It needs a serious rework, and a different look to it. Oh also whoever this Donald Trump guy is he looks like a wrinkly slug with a lot of dust bunnies on its head. If he is the face of this app I don’t want this to be seen by children, it’s not for the faint of heart.

attributes.title: Worst app in history🤬🤬
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it started glitching uncontrollably and caused my phone to shut off MULTIPLE TIMES. IT HAS TO BE SHUT DOWN. I haven’t been able to get to the rest of my phone or any other apps. I’m deleting it and you should take it down. I’m very angry 😠. DO NOT GET THIS APP. IT WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE

attributes.title: I- just no🤢👁👄👁
attributes.review: I am revolted this is the worst app ever it forced me to look at an orange with corn hair for hours🤢🤢🍊🌽 after I installed it, it drained the battery my phone no longer works and refuses to be charged I’m writing this review on my carrier pigeon John and now John is lost and hasn’t come back for 3 days thanks a lot.😡😡🤮

attributes.title: why no junkook
attributes.review: i came to this app for some junkook asmr and there was nothing of the sort!! it was all some angry baby (who may have some health condition because he looks very orange) yelling about disliking people of color! very ugly no kiss for him. it also leaked my home address and all of the thumbs from the spy kids movie broke into my home and stole my dog. its been resolved now, it turned out it was shane yëæw who sent them so i broke into his mansion and stole my dog back. but anyways, this app is terrible please have it removed
